comments:
On the 20041207_1249 driver, test case Log_Sets_3 of RAS_Other_Log_Views did 
not produce the expected result.

Steps:
1. Resume testing from the last step of test case "Log Sets 2". (Note: the last 
step of that test case says, "The default log set should be loaded and should 
become the active log set.")
2. Open log set "Test" and rename it to "Test_Renamed",  make sure the new name 
is reflected in the wizard page
3. Finish the wizard and reopen it, make sure the active log set 
is "Test_Renamed"
...
But at this point, the active log set is "default" instead of "Test_Renamed".

Also, not mentioned in the test case, just something that I noticed.
1. Click "Edit Log Sets" to rename the log set.
2. Click "Rename..."
3. Click "OK" without changing the name.
Result: the "Test_Renamed" log set is deleted. After that, "Edit Log Sets" 
and "Open Log Set" don't open dialogs when clicked, and "Finish" doesn't seem 
to have any effect. No error dialog appears but the following stack trace is 
sent to the log:
